installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Modrinth Serverpack Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Install curl, python3, pip3 and java OpenJDK and configure Java
apt-get update -y
apt-get upgrade -y
mkdir -p /usr/share/man/man1 /usr/share/man/man2
apt -y install sudo curl python3 python3-pip openjdk-11-jdk-headless rsync
sudo dpkg --configure -a
update-alternatives --config java

# Go to server folder
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
curl -o C-S-D.tar.gz -L "https://github.com/kev626/Minecraft-Serverpack-Installer/archive/master.tar.gz"
tar -zxvf C-S-D.tar.gz --strip-components=1
pip3 install -r requirements.txt

# Remove old modpack files if exists
rm -rf /mnt/server/libraries
rm -rf /mnt/server/mods
rm -rf /mnt/server/coremods
rm -rf /mnt/server/.fabric
rm -rf /mnt/server/user_jvm_args.txt
rm /mnt/server/server.jar

# Run modpack installer script
python3 run.py -provider ftb -modpack-id ${MODPACK_ID} --modpack-version ${VERSION_ID} --clean-scripts --pterodactyl
rm C-S-D.tar.gz

# Move files from scripts modpack_folder to main dir for ptero to see it
rsync -a /mnt/server/modpack_folder/ /mnt/server/
rm -rf /mnt/server/modpack_folder

# Deletes files left from script
rm /mnt/server/*.py
rm /mnt/server/README.md
rm /mnt/server/requirements.txt
rm /mnt/server/.gitignore
rm -r /mnt/server/__pycache__
rm /mnt/server/ModpackDownloader-cli-*.jar

# Create symlink to allow for new forge startup
cd /mnt/server
ln -sf libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/*/unix_args.txt unix_args.txt

variables.name: Technic Modpack Slug
variables.description:
The modpack slug found on the modpack page.

(Ex: https://www.technicpack.net/modpack/attack-of-the-bteam.552556 - slug is attack-of-the-bteam)

variables.name: Modpack Version
variables.description: Version of the modpack to use. Available versions can be found on the modpacks's page on Technic. Set to "latest" to pull the latest version.

variables.name: Server Jarfile
variables.description: Full name of JAR file to use to run the server. The download script will rename it to server.jar by default.

variables.name: JVM Startup Flags
variables.description:
JVM Startup flags to use for the server. For Modpacks we recommend using Aikars flags for optimum performance. They are enabled by default.

Details: https://aikar.co/2018/07/02/tuning-the-jvm-g1gc-garbage-collector-flags-for-minecraft/
